verses.verse: וַיַּ֨עַשׂ <WH6213> kept יֹאשִׁיָּ֧הוּ <WH2977> Moreover Josiah בִֽירוּשָׁלִַ֛ם <WH3389> in Jerusalem פֶּ֖סַח <WH6453> a passover לַיהוָ֑ה <WH3068> unto the LORD וַיִּשְׁחֲט֣וּ <WH7819> and they killed הַפֶּ֔סַח <WH6453> the passover בְּאַרְבָּעָ֥ה <WH702> four עָשָׂ֖ר <WH6240> teen לַחֹ֥דֶשׁ <WH2320> month הָרִאשֽׁוֹן׃ <WH7223> [day] of the first

וַיַּעֲמֵ֥ד <WH5975> And he set הַכֹּהֲנִ֖ים <WH3548> the priests עַל־ <WH5921> in מִשְׁמְרוֹתָ֑ם <WH4931> in their charges וַֽיְחַזְּקֵ֔ם <WH2388> and encouraged לַעֲבוֹדַ֖ת <WH5656> them to the service בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> of the house יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> of the LORD

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> And said לַ֠לְוִיִּם <WH3881> unto the Levites [הַמְּבוּנִים כ] (הַמְּבִינִ֨ים <WH995> attend ק) לְכָל־ <WH3605> all יִשְׂרָאֵ֜ל <WH3478> all Israel הַקְּדוֹשִׁ֣ים <WH6918> which were holy לַיהוָ֗ה <WH3068> unto the LORD תְּנ֤וּ <WH5414> Put אֶת־ <WH853> אֲרוֹן־ <WH727> ark הַקֹּ֙דֶשׁ֙ <WH6944> the holy בַּ֠בַּיִת <WH1004> in the house אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> which בָּנָ֜ה <WH1129> did build שְׁלֹמֹ֤ה <WH8010> which Solomon בֶן־ <WH1121> the son דָּוִיד֙ <WH1732> of David מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> king יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel אֵין־ <WH369> no לָכֶ֥ם מַשָּׂ֖א <WH4853> [it shall] not [be] a burden בַּכָּתֵ֑ף <WH3802> upon [your] shoulders עַתָּ֗ה <WH6258> Now עִבְדוּ֙ <WH5647> serve אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> now the LORD אֱלֹֽהֵיכֶ֔ם <WH430> your God וְאֵ֖ת <WH853> עַמּ֥וֹ <WH5971> and his people יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> Israel

[וְהִכֹּונוּ כ] (וְהָכִ֥ינוּ <WH3559> certain ק) לְבֵית־ <WH1004> [yourselves] by the houses אֲבוֹתֵיכֶ֖ם <WH1> of your fathers כְּמַחְלְקוֹתֵיכֶ֑ם <WH4256> after your courses בִּכְתָ֗ב <WH3791> according to the writing דָּוִיד֙ <WH1732> of David מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> king יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel וּבְמִכְתַּ֖ב <WH4385> and according to the writing שְׁלֹמֹ֥ה <WH8010> of Solomon בְנֽוֹ׃ <WH1121> his son

וְעִמְד֣וּ <WH5975> And stand in בַקֹּ֗דֶשׁ <WH6944> the holy לִפְלֻגּוֹת֙ <WH6391> [place] according to the divisions בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> of the families הָֽאָב֔וֹת <WH1> of the fathers לַאֲחֵיכֶ֖ם <WH251> of your brethren בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> the lay הָעָ֑ם <WH5971> people וַחֲלֻקַּ֥ת <WH2515> and [after] the division בֵּֽית־ <WH1004> household אָ֖ב <WH1> of a father's לַלְוִיִּֽם׃ <WH3881> of the Levites

וְשַׁחֲט֖וּ <WH7819> So kill הַפָּ֑סַח <WH6453> the passover וְהִתְקַדְּשׁוּ֙ <WH6942> and sanctify וְהָכִ֣ינוּ <WH3559> yourselves and prepare לַאֲחֵיכֶ֔ם <WH251> your brethren לַעֲשׂ֥וֹת <WH6213> that [they] may do כִּדְבַר־ <WH1697> according to the word יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD בְּיַד־ <WH3027> by the hand מֹשֶֽׁה׃ <WH4872> of Moses פ

וַיָּ֣רֶם <WH7311> gave יֹאשִׁיָּ֣הוּ <WH2977> And Josiah לִבְנֵ֪י <WH1121> afflicted הָעָ֟ם <WH5971> folk צֹ֞אן <WH6629> of the flock כְּבָשִׂ֣ים <WH3532> lambs וּבְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> afflicted עִזִּים֮ <WH5795> goat הַכֹּ֣ל <WH3605> all manner לַפְּסָחִים֒ <WH6453> all for the passover offerings לְכָל־ <WH3605> that הַנִּמְצָ֗א <WH4672> for all that were present לְמִסְפַּר֙ <WH4557> to the number שְׁלֹשִׁ֣ים <WH7970> of thirty אֶ֔לֶף <WH505> thousand וּבָקָ֖ר <WH1241> bullocks שְׁלֹ֣שֶׁת <WH7969> and three אֲלָפִ֑ים <WH505> thousand אֵ֖לֶּה <WH428> these מֵרְכ֥וּשׁ <WH7399> substance הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <WH4428> these [were] of the king's ס

וְשָׂרָ֞יו <WH8269> And his princes לִנְדָבָ֥ה <WH5071> willingly לָעָ֛ם <WH5971> unto the people לַכֹּהֲנִ֥ים <WH3548> to the priests וְלַלְוִיִּ֖ם <WH3881> and to the Levites הֵרִ֑ימוּ <WH7311> gave חִלְקִיָּ֨ה <WH2518> Hilkiah וּזְכַרְיָ֜הוּ <WH2148> and Zechariah וִֽיחִיאֵ֗ל <WH3171> and Jehiel נְגִידֵי֙ <WH5057> rulers בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> of the house הָאֱלֹהִ֔ים <WH430> of God לַכֹּהֲנִ֞ים <WH3548> unto the priests נָתְנ֣וּ <WH5414> gave לַפְּסָחִ֗ים <WH6453> for the passover offerings אַלְפַּ֙יִם֙ <WH505> two thousand וְשֵׁ֣שׁ <WH8337> and six מֵא֔וֹת <WH3967> hundred וּבָקָ֖ר <WH1241> oxen שְׁלֹ֥שׁ <WH7969> [small cattle] and three מֵאֽוֹת׃ <WH3967> hundred

[וְכָונַנְיָהוּ כ] (וְ֠כָֽנַנְיָהוּ <WH3562> Conaniah ק) וּשְׁמַֽעְיָ֨הוּ <WH8098> also and Shemaiah וּנְתַנְאֵ֜ל <WH5417> and Nethaneel אֶחָ֗יו <WH251> his brethren וַחֲשַׁבְיָ֧הוּ <WH2811> and Hashabiah וִיעִיאֵ֛ל <WH3273> and Jeiel וְיוֹזָבָ֖ד <WH3107> and Jozabad שָׂרֵ֣י <WH8269> chief הַלְוִיִּ֑ם <WH3881> of the Levites הֵרִ֨ימוּ <WH7311> gave לַלְוִיִּ֤ם <WH3881> unto the Levites לַפְּסָחִים֙ <WH6453> for passover offerings חֲמֵ֣שֶׁת <WH2568> five אֲלָפִ֔ים <WH505> thousand וּבָקָ֖ר <WH1241> oxen חֲמֵ֥שׁ <WH2568> [small cattle] and five מֵאֽוֹת׃ <WH3967> hundred

וַתִּכּ֖וֹן <WH3559> was prepared הָעֲבוֹדָ֑ה <WH5656> So the service וַיַּֽעַמְד֨וּ <WH5975> stood הַכֹּהֲנִ֧ים <WH3548> and the priests עַל־ <WH5921> and עָמְדָ֛ם <WH5975> stood וְהַלְוִיִּ֥ם <WH3881> and the Levites עַל־ <WH5921> by מַחְלְקוֹתָ֖ם <WH4256> in their courses כְּמִצְוַ֥ת <WH4687> commandment הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <WH4428> according to the king's

וַֽיִּשְׁחֲט֖וּ <WH7819> And they killed הַפָּ֑סַח <WH6453> the passover וַיִּזְרְק֤וּ <WH2236> sprinkled הַכֹּהֲנִים֙ <WH3548> and the priests מִיָּדָ֔ם <WH3027> [the blood] from their hands וְהַלְוִיִּ֖ם <WH3881> and the Levites מַפְשִׁיטִֽים׃ <WH6584> flayed

וַיָּסִ֨ירוּ <WH5493> And they removed הָעֹלָ֜ה <WH5930> the burnt offerings לְ֠תִתָּם <WH5414> that they might give לְמִפְלַגּ֤וֹת <WH4653> according to the divisions לְבֵית־ <WH1004> households אָבוֹת֙ <WH1> of the fathers' לִבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> of the lay הָעָ֔ם <WH5971> people לְהַקְרִיב֙ <WH7126> to offer לַיהוָ֔ה <WH3068> unto the LORD כַּכָּת֖וּב <WH3789> as [it is] written בְּסֵ֣פֶר <WH5612> in the book מֹשֶׁ֑ה <WH4872> of Moses וְכֵ֖ן <WH3651> this לַבָּקָֽר׃ <WH1241> And so [did they] with the oxen

וְאַחַ֗ר <WH310> And afterward הֵכִ֤ינוּ <WH3559> they made ready לָהֶם֙ <WH1992> and for וְלַכֹּ֣הֲנִ֔ים <WH3548> for themselves and for the priests כִּ֤י <WH3588> because הַכֹּהֲנִים֙ <WH3548> because the priests בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> the sons אַהֲרֹ֔ן <WH175> of Aaron בְּהַֽעֲל֛וֹת <WH5927> [were busied] in offering הָעוֹלָ֥ה <WH5930> of burnt offerings וְהַחֲלָבִ֖ים <WH2459> and the fat עַד־ <WH5704> until לָ֑יְלָה <WH3915> until night וְהַלְוִיִּם֙ <WH3881> therefore the Levites הֵכִ֣ינוּ <WH3559> prepared לָהֶ֔ם <WH1992> and for וְלַכֹּהֲנִ֖ים <WH3548> for themselves and for the priests בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> the sons אַהֲרֹֽן׃ <WH175> of Aaron

וְהַמְשֹֽׁרֲרִ֨ים <WH7891> And the singers בְּנֵי־ <WH1121> the sons אָסָ֜ף <WH623> of Asaph עַל־ <WH5921> at מַעֲמָדָ֗ם <WH4612> [were] in their place כְּמִצְוַ֤ת <WH4687> according to the commandment דָּוִיד֙ <WH1732> of David וְאָסָ֞ף <WH623> and Asaph וְהֵימָ֤ן <WH1968> and Heman וִֽידֻתוּן֙ <WH3038> and Jeduthun חוֹזֵ֣ה <WH2374> seer הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <WH4428> the king's וְהַשֹּׁעֲרִ֖ים <WH7778> and the porters לְשַׁ֣עַר <WH8179> [waited] at every gate וָשָׁ֑עַר <WH8179> gate אֵ֣ין <WH369> have לָהֶ֗ם לָסוּר֙ <WH5493> they might not depart מֵעַ֣ל <WH5921> from עֲבֹֽדָתָ֔ם <WH5656> from their service כִּֽי־ <WH3588> because אֲחֵיהֶ֥ם <WH251> for their brethren הַלְוִיִּ֖ם <WH3881> the Levites הֵכִ֥ינוּ <WH3559> prepared לָהֶֽם׃

וַ֠תִּכּוֹן <WH3559> was prepared כָּל־ <WH3605> all עֲבוֹדַ֨ת <WH5656> So all the service יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> of the LORD בַּיּ֤וֹם <WH3117> the same day הַהוּא֙ <WH1931> he לַעֲשׂ֣וֹת <WH6213> to keep הַפֶּ֔סַח <WH6453> the passover וְהַעֲל֣וֹת <WH5927> and to offer עֹל֔וֹת <WH5930> burnt offerings עַ֖ל <WH5921> on מִזְבַּ֣ח <WH4196> upon the altar יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD כְּמִצְוַ֖ת <WH4687> according to the commandment הַמֶּ֥לֶךְ <WH4428> of king יֹאשִׁיָּֽהוּ׃ <WH2977> Josiah

וַיַּעֲשׂ֨וּ <WH6213> kept בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> And the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֧ל <WH3478> of Israel הַֽנִּמְצְאִ֛ים <WH4672> that were present אֶת־ <WH853> הַפֶּ֖סַח <WH6453> the passover בָּעֵ֣ת <WH6256> at that time הַהִ֑יא <WH1931> he וְאֶת־ <WH853> חַ֥ג <WH2282> and the feast הַמַּצּ֖וֹת <WH4682> of unleavened bread שִׁבְעַ֥ת <WH7651> seven יָמִֽים׃ <WH3117> days

וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> nor נַעֲשָׂ֨ה <WH6213> to that kept פֶ֤סַח <WH6453> And there was no passover כָּמֹ֙הוּ֙ <WH3644> like בְּיִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> in Israel מִימֵ֖י <WH3117> from the days שְׁמוּאֵ֣ל <WH8050> of Samuel הַנָּבִ֑יא <WH5030> the prophet וְכָל־ <WH3605> had any מַלְכֵ֣י <WH4428> all the kings יִשְׂרָאֵ֣ל ׀ <WH3478> of Israel לֹֽא־ <WH3808> nor עָשׂ֡וּ <WH6213> neither did כַּפֶּ֣סַח <WH6453> such a passover אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after עָשָׂ֣ה <WH6213> keep יֹֽ֠אשִׁיָּהוּ <WH2977> as Josiah וְהַכֹּהֲנִ֨ים <WH3548> and the priests וְהַלְוִיִּ֤ם <WH3881> and the Levites וְכָל־ <WH3605> all יְהוּדָה֙ <WH3063> and all Judah וְיִשְׂרָאֵ֣ל <WH3478> and Israel הַנִּמְצָ֔א <WH4672> that were present וְיוֹשְׁבֵ֖י <WH3427> and the inhabitants יְרוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <WH3389> of Jerusalem ס

בִּשְׁמוֹנֶ֤ה <WH8083> eight עֶשְׂרֵה֙ <WH6240> teen שָׁנָ֔ה <WH8141> year לְמַלְכ֖וּת <WH4438> of the reign יֹאשִׁיָּ֑הוּ <WH2977> of Josiah נַעֲשָׂ֖ה <WH6213> kept הַפֶּ֥סַח <WH6453> was this passover הַזֶּֽה׃ <WH2088> this

אַחֲרֵ֣י <WH310> After כָל־ <WH3605> all זֹ֗את <WH2063> likewise אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> when הֵכִ֤ין <WH3559> had prepared יֹֽאשִׁיָּ֙הוּ֙ <WH2977> all this when Josiah אֶת־ <WH853> הַבַּ֔יִת <WH1004> the temple עָלָ֞ה <WH5927> came up נְכ֧וֹ <WH5224> Necho מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> king מִצְרַ֛יִם <WH4714> of Egypt לְהִלָּחֵ֥ם <WH3898> to fight בְּכַרְכְּמִ֖ישׁ <WH3751> against Carchemish עַל־ <WH5921> on פְּרָ֑ת <WH6578> by Euphrates וַיֵּצֵ֥א <WH3318> went out לִקְרָאת֖וֹ <WH7125> against יֹאשִׁיָּֽהוּ׃ <WH2977> and Josiah
